title: yowl
description: A Web Application for Reviews, Ratings, and Community Engagement
text: YOWL is a dynamic web application I developed using Node.js for the backend and React for the frontend. The platform allows users to search for businesses, read and write reviews, and rate companies. With a robust backend handling user authentication, database management, and API integrations, and a responsive, intuitive frontend, YOWL delivers a seamless experience for its community.

title: azimut
description: Fullstack developpment for a production agency website
text: A dynamic website created for Azimut Prod, a production agency specializing in music videos and brand films. The backend, developed with PHP, ensures smooth functionality, while the frontend, built with JavaScript, enables seamless video visualization directly on the platform. This site provides an engaging and professional showcase of the agency's work.

title: i-Shop
text: IShop is a fully functional e-commerce website that I developed from scratch. The backend, built with PHP and connected to a database, powers essential features like user authentication via email or Google accounts, a dynamic shopping cart, and secure payment processing through Stripe. On the frontend, I design a responsive and intuitive interface, delivering a seamless and enjoyable shopping experience.
